subject: Bonuses
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco Giants gave Buster Posey, the fifth overall pick in the amateur draft, a $6.2 million bonus, which is the highest in the draft’s history.
snippet: The San Francisco Giants gave Buster Posey, the fifth overall pick in the amateur draft, a $6.2 million bonus, which is the highest in the draft’s history.
